content: Is there any IG Publisher report that measures the 'coverage' of a profile by examples? ie does every element in the profile have an example. There is for use of an extension, but I thought I recalled something that covered all profile elements...
"every element in the profile" - you mean "every constrained element or any extension"?
there isn't anything like this though it would be possible
OK - my memory must be faulty. no problem...
there's something for this in the main build for resources but not for profiles
And I have a tool for examples, that you can also point at a server. Buts it's just core props too.
